product_name: Eureka Dual Temperature 30/50 Sleeping Bag - Regular - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Great for summertime camp outings, this roomy, hybrid-rectangular sleeping bag combines the thermal versatility of 2 temperature ratings with the compact performance of a mummy bag.
short_description: Great for summertime camp outings, this roomy, hybrid-rectangular sleeping bag combines the thermal versatility of 2 temperature ratings with the compact performance of a mummy bag.
